description: Shot types for e-commerce product videos

shot_types.name: Hero Product Shot
shot_types.description: Product centered, clean background, dramatic lighting
shot_types.prompt_template: Professional product photography of {{product}}, centered composition, {{background}}, studio lighting, commercial quality, 4K, vertical format 9:16

shot_types.name: Lifestyle Context Shot
shot_types.description: Product in use in real-world setting
shot_types.prompt_template: {{person_description}} using {{product}} in {{setting}}, natural lighting, authentic UGC style, candid moment, 4K vertical

shot_types.name: Close-Up Detail
shot_types.description: Macro shot of product features or texture
shot_types.prompt_template: Extreme close-up of {{product_feature}}, shallow depth of field, texture detail, professional macro photography, 4K

shot_types.name: Text Card
shot_types.description: Bold text overlay on solid or gradient background
shot_types.prompt_template: Minimal background, {{color}} gradient or solid, clean modern aesthetic, vertical 9:16

shot_types.name: Hands B-Roll
shot_types.prompt_template: Hands holding or using {{product}}, clean background, soft natural lighting, lifestyle photography, 4K vertical
shot_types.when_to_use: Demonstrating ease of use, tactile quality

shot_types.name: Before/After Split
shot_types.description: Split screen or transition showing transformation
shot_types.prompt_template: Split comparison showing {{before_state}} transforming to {{after_state}}, clean composition, 4K vertical

shot_types.name: Packaging Shot
shot_types.prompt_template: Premium product packaging of {{product}}, unboxing aesthetic, clean background, soft lighting, 4K vertical

shot_types.name: Reaction Shot
shot_types.description: Person reacting to product, expressing emotion
shot_types.prompt_template: Person with {{emotion}} expression, looking at product, natural lighting, authentic UGC style, vertical selfie angle
